class MtpDevice

Detailed Description

This class encapsulates information about a storage unit on an MTP device.

This corresponds to the StorageInfo Dataset described in section 5.2.2 of the MTP specification.

base::String gaia::mtp::MtpStorageInfo::getDescription ( )

Returns the description string for the storage unit.

This is typically displayed to the user in the user interface on the MTP host.

the storage unit description
